episode: I am sad about dog health condition

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am sad about dog health condition

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. I hope your dog feels better soon.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It will make me happy if your words become true

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I hope so too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: But there is still problem in my dog health

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm really sorry to hear that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He vomited whatever he ate

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds tough. Have you consulted a vet?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. I brought up him to hospita.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's good.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Doctor said my dog was suffered by food poison

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Then he gave medicine to dog. But still I am worried about his unhealth

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am sad about his suffer and less active

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Even I am sad for what mistakes happen in his food by me

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's not your fault.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Doctor also said this same

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's reassuring.
